website_summaries.verdict: This mini projector lives up to its description and is almost effortless to use. However, the picture quality could be better.
pros: Quite portable – can fit in your pocket or the palm of your hand
Rechargeable and easy to set up
Comes with a mini tripod and lifetime customer support
cons: Picture quality isn't very sharp, and getting it in focus can be a hassle
Isn't compatible with all smartphones, especially some Android devices

website_summaries.verdict: The Magnasonic LED Pocket Pico Video Projector performs surprisingly well considering its low brightness, resolution, and price.

There also is a reset pin hole but as the device became stuck on something i had on the screen, pressing the small button in the pin-hole did absolutley nothing. i found if i restart my iphone, the device connected to the projector, that cleared the frozen screen. one other disapointing thing, alot of shows wont play on the device becase of licencing issues. example i tried to play the come back show “ Murphy Brown” on comcast on demand streaming site, nope. no shows will play. not the projectors issue but disapointing none the less.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mini Projector
customer_reviews.text: This is a great projector for the price ($169.99). It projects a clear, sharp picture in both lighted & dark rooms & is easy to transport due to its small size. It comes with most of the connectors one may need for various devices, including a tripod that does a great job stablizing the unit. As another customers reported, the battery does not keep a charge if the device goes unused for about a week, but other than that, this projector is a great value for the entertainment it provides. You cannot go wrong with this purchase & I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: DJS

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the money, just make sure it’s dark in the room.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for a portable projector. Pros - excellent picture - very portable - decent sound - quiet - easy to connect and operate Cons - battery life is just enough for a short movie - no way to change the screen shape so the projector has to be level and pointed straight at the screen. This can be a problem when finding a place to mount it. Overall, well worth the money. I bought it for my kid, but could easily use it to show movies on a big screen

product_meta.title: Magnasonic Mini Portable Pico Video Projector PP71, HDMI, Battery, Speakers, 50 ANSI Lumens for Movies, Presentations
product_meta.description:
Bring your favorite movies, TV shows, presentations, and video games to the big screen thanks to the Magnasonic Mini Projector. Use your HDMI connection to enjoy a home theater experience anywhere with a long-lasting 2 hour rechargeable battery and dual built-in speakers. This high performance Pico projector allows you to connect your laptop, streaming media/HDMI video player, smartphone, tablet, and more. (Note: smartphones & tablets require an additional adapter)

Exceptional 100" DLP Display Quality Powered by TI
Enjoy a vibrant picture thanks to the 50 ANSI lumen Texas Instruments LED light engine. Digital Light Processing technology allows you to experience razor sharp and life-like images with the same technology that Hollywood relies on. Comparable to projectors much larger in size, this projector features 854x480 (WVGA) pixel resolution and 1000:1 contrast ratio.

Portable Cinema Experience in Your Pocket
Perfect for TV marathons on your wall or ceiling at home, backyard movie nights with friends and family, or your next corporate presentation. You can even charge your USB devices using the built-in battery (3400mAh), and even use the projector while charging the battery, making this the ultimate travel companion. Watch anywhere with the integrated speakers, use the 3.5mm headphone jack for personal listening, or connect to external speakers for bigger sound.

Plug & Play with All Your HDMI Devices
Easy setup, just connect using the included HDMI cable. Compatible with HDMI devices including laptops, PC/Macs, cable/satellite boxes, gaming consoles, media players & HDMI video players (accepts 1080p video input). Smartphones & tablets also compatible but require an additional adapter (not included).

What's included
PP71 Mini Projector, HDMI cable, Tripod, USB-to-Micro USB Charging Cable, User's Manual, Lifetime Customer Support, 1 Year Manufacturer's Warranty
feature_bullets: LARGE 100-INCH SCREEN - Plug & play pocket projector with HDMI connection, allows anyone to project sharp, vivid videos
VIBRANT PICTURE QUALITY - Experience the 50 ANSI lumen LED DLP light engine, stunning 854x480 resolution & 1000:1 contrast ratio at home or in the office
PORTABLE VIDEO - Watch movies or presentations anywhere, anytime thanks to its mini, lightweight design & long lasting 2 hour rechargeable battery (3400mAh)
COMPATIBLE WITH ANY HDMI DEVICE - Project video from your laptop, gaming console and any other streaming media/HDMI video players (Note: smartphones & tablets require an additional adapter)
BUILT-IN SPEAKERS - Enjoy the audio from the internal speakers
